{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3112371,"name":"Violet Monserate","username":"Ctrl_Vi","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/49beb7/{size}.png","created_at":"2022-12-20T06:25:32.094Z","cooked":"

Hey, y’all! I’m the programming lead for PFR 2097 in Seattle, WA, and I was wondering if anyone is selling Raspberry pi 4’s, hopefully, model b? It would be so valuable to be able to do some April Tag fiducials on something more potent than a pi 3, so any help is appreciated!

Check out @asid61’s thread on alternative coprocessors - you can get a lot faster for not that much more money.

There are plenty available on Amazon, they’re just not cheap (about $220 on average for the Pi 4 model B with 8gb RAM.) But if you really want one right now, you can get one.

If you need a rpi 4b you can watch this site for them to pop-up https://rpilocator.com/. That’s how I was able to buy one. Adafruit typically restocks Wednesday

Last year, I was able to find a couple of these… So, I was able to get a couple of PI 3s for $100. They prioritize providing PIs to people that embed them… So, you just need to find them and liberate them. Good luck!

Micro Center

Atari Pi Kit - Raspberry Pi 3B+; 32GB Atari Micro SD (100+ licensed games);...

Get it now! Find over 30,000 products at your local Micro Center, including the Pi Kit - Raspberry Pi 3B+; 32GB Atari Micro SD (100+ licensed games); Custom Atari Pi case; USB GamePad
